New Records: Shohei Ohtani is close to achieving the 60-60 club with 53 home runs and 55 stolen bases this season.
Key Match Events: Mookie Betts hit a walk-off home run in the ninth inning to secure the Dodgers' victory over the Rockies.
Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers entered the game looking to maintain their one-game lead over the Philadelphia Phillies in the NL standings.
Post-Match Reflections: The Dodgers' victory was a crucial moment in their playoff push, with key performances from Mookie Betts and Shohei Ohtani.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game marked Yoshinobu Yamamoto's second-most earned runs in a game this season, despite a rough outing.
Others: The Dodgers have six games remaining, including series against the San Diego Padres and the Rockies, to finish the 2024 campaign.
